Act as an SEO consultant for a sports betting news channel. You've been hired to help them optimize video clips from their TV shows for distribution on YouTube. They want to maximize reach so it's imperative to optimize the video title, description, and keywords, for organic search.  

In addition to creating a title, description, and keyword list [TARGETLANGUAGE], you need to also create a catchy twitter post.
